Enumeration Type Documentation

◆ gai_errc

enum class sockpp::gai_errc
strong

Errors returned from the getaddressinfo() function.

These are the possible errors returned from getaddressinfo() placed in a class enumeration to give them a string, specific type.

Note that this is not used in Windows since it returns errors that are managed by its GetLastError.
